sentences.en: Accusing us of being disloyal to cover his own sorry behavior is truly execrable.
sentences.cn: 他指责我们不忠诚以掩盖他自己的错误行为，真令人厌恶。

sentences.en: Accusing us of being disloyal to cover his own sorry behaviour is truly execrable.
sentences.cn: 用指控我们的不忠来掩盖他个人的不当行为真是很恶劣。

sentences.en: Convenience is, however, in all affairs of life, an execrable test of value.
sentences.cn: 然而在生活事务的各方面, 利益是可恶的价值准则.

sentences.en: Digging locale's environment is execrable, so it is unsuitable for operator's fieldwork.
sentences.cn: 挖掘现场环境恶劣, 操作人员不宜在现场工作.

sentences.en: He stood at the desk, labouring in his execrable handwriting.
sentences.cn: 他站在桌前, 用他那拙劣的笔迹吃力地写着.

sentences.en: On what foundation does your bold, mad, pitiable, and execrable arrogance rest?
sentences.cn: 你这种恬不知耻 、 疯狂, 既可怜又可恨的狂妄态度究竟有什么根据 呢 ?
